channel.title: How do i make myself owner on a 508 server
channel.description: i know lots of people have asked this but i tried to find another post with the question and the answer but i cant find another one so.. yeah how do i make myself owner on a 508 server

item.title: How do i make myself owner on a 508 server
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

Please use the Search button before asking for help…

Heres a section from jc22493’s tutorial.

[b]Tutorial One - How to make yourself an administrator/Owner[/b] [b]Files Modified[/b] - Login class (Login.Java)

Procedure -

Go into your login class and search for -

if (p.username.equals("

You should see this -

if (p.username.equals("NAME")) { p.rights = 2; }


Explaining the code

if (p.username.equals("NAME")) {

That part of the code means that if the player’s username is the name between the quotation marks, then -

p.rights = 2;

That part of the code means that the player’s rights will automatically be 2 when he/she logs in.

You can also add your own code for logging in as moderator -

if (p.username.equals("NAME")) { p.rights = 1; }

Notice I changed the p.rights = 2; to p.rights = 1;. This means that if the player’s username is the name between the quotation marks, then they will log in as a moderator.

These are the player rights for 508’s.
0 = Normal player
1 = Moderator
2 = Administrator/Owner

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself owner on a 508 server
